results.title: Mumbai News Roundup: Political Allegations, Pit Bull Concerns, and Infrastructure Issues
results.summary: This article covers multiple Mumbai news stories. Highlights include allegations of political honey-trapping, PETA's call for a pit bull breeding ban after a mauling, and concerns over wasted funds on underused foot overbridges. Maharashtra Agriculture Minister Manikrao Kokate faces allegations of playing rummy during an Assembly session, while Shiv Sena (UBT) claims hidden cameras led to the collapse of the MVA government. PETA urges a ban on specific dog breeds after a pit bull attack. Several Mumbai railway foot overbridges are criticized for being underused due to poor planning.
